fields.fieldTitle: WHO are you going to teach? (PLURAL)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: funnel hackers; real estate investors; parents of kids with ADHD; people who want to lose weight; women who want to look younger, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 big, huge result they desire most in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience really wants to ________." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create a 7-figure funnel; make a quick 10K this weekend by flipping houses on eBay; naturally destroy your kid's ADHD; reconnect with your wife; lose weight without exercising; enjoy a youthful appearance, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the "new opportunity" you offer to get that big result?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: marketing funnels; online house flipping; nutritional behavior therapy; marital reconnection; getting their bodies into a state of ketosis; apple stem cell therapy; etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is your specific vehicle that delivers the new opportunity?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ClickFunnels; using my Cyber House Flipping System; understanding The ADHD Nutrition Solution that works in one weekend; discovering The Newlywed Code that reignites romance in 30 minutes; drinking Pruvitâ€™s ketones, which put the body into ketosis within 10 minutes; using apple stem cell therapy to stimulate new cell growth instead of covering up dead cells; etc.
